law.catch_line: This subtitle does not prohibit the appointment of an attorney, other than through the Office, to re...
law.text:
This subtitle does not prohibit the appointment of an attorney, other than through the Office, to represent an indigent individual by the District Court, a circuit court, or the Court of Special Appeals if:
there is a conflict in legal representation in a matter involving multiple defendants, and one of the defendants is represented by or through the Office; or
the Office declines to provide representation to an indigent individual entitled to representation under this subtitle.
